title: Dirty Deeds and Bloody Knaves
description: From the world of Curiouser and Curiouser: Steampunk Alice in WonderlandA Steampunk Fairy Tales Short StoryWhen Knave and Rabbit are given a job by the countess, there’s no distance they won’t climb to get the job done. Coming back down, however, proves much stickier.
author: Melanie Karsak
